lyrics:

She easy as a free throw so you fade away fast My ring cost bout' a brick, my watch cost bout' a Benz Your main chick on my dick, she let me smash her friends My earrings are so cold, they look like they on fire You think your stones are colder, I think that you a liar I hold court in the street, I'm the judge so bring my jewelry And ain't no one gon' take it so no need to get insurance My chain how [?], why you standing close to her You should be like me and let her go like just you supposed to bruh Put her on a poster, a flyer and a bottle [?] in a minute while you high-steppin your prada I'm all about a dollar if you with me gon' n' holla' She's a spitter I ain't with' her, you gotta roll or swalla' Or we can't talk money, we can't chop green Or convo' about the cabbage if you know
